through our city; portions of their products will
be left for sale here, or exchanged for our own, or

Is not every State in the West and South
interested in securing such a mart as New Orleans
will then be for their productions 1 It will then be.
tlie market of lite world, from which the farthest

make it, and New Orleans will sway every railroad in the West aud South, now made* or
making, or that may be hereafter made, as so many
instruments to make her the commercial queen
of the world. I trust the importance of this road
and its power to confer such advantages, will find
an apology, in your minds, for the length of this
report, and what, to some minds, may appear
as irrelevant matter; but what it contains my
judgment has deemed it proper it should contain.
